Class OntologyFileFormat

java.lang.Object
  org.semanticweb.kaon2.api.formatting.OntologyFileFormat

public class OntologyFileFormat
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides several static methods for determining information about files.

getFileExtension

public static java.lang.String getFileExtension(java.lang.String formatName)
Returns the default extension for files of the format with the given name.

Parameters:
formatName - the name of the format
Returns:
the extension for files of the given format (null if the format is not supported)
